column5: Hey Guys and Gals  Got some pics I am trying to attach to a post.  Have them uploaded to Photobucket But can't get em in the Post.  I am using the IMG link and trying to copy and paste,  But no luck!!!  Any Tips?  Thanks Rick

Hey Guys and Gals  Got some pics I am trying to attach to a post.  Have them uploaded to Photobucket But can't get em in the Post.  I am using the IMG link and trying to copy and paste,  But no luck!!!  Any Tips?  Thanks Rick Try putting the curser in the spot where you post first on the new post after you have said something.It should be blinking?Than go to photo bucket. .After you right click and save,when your back at the sight,right click and paste.Hope that will work for you.

Try putting the curser in the spot where you post first on the new post after you have said something.It should be blinking?Than go to photo bucket. .After you right click and save,when your back at the sight,right click and paste.Hope that will work for you. You may have to left click the img before you right click.
OK Davey I will give that a try

Rick  When you want to post a pic. Put your cursur on the the pic. A little gear looking thing will appear. Just slide to it and a window will drop. Click on GET LINKS. Another window will drop down. LEFT click on IMG CODES. (it will turn yellow. If it,s blue,it didnt copy)  Once you have done that, LEFT ,click on your thread where you want it. RIGHT CLICK. Click on  PASTE.  Hope that helps.  B
Thanks fellas I got it Great ,can't wait !!!
